mapper.select: SELECT 'POST' AS GUBUN , A.POST_ID , A.PLACE_ID , A.TITLE , A.SUB_TITLE , A.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , (SELECT COMPANION_TYPE_CD FROM PLACE01_TB WHERE PLACE_ID = A.PLACE_ID) AS COMPANION_TYPE , C.USER_NM AS WRITER , A.UPDATE_DT AS WRITE_DATE FROM POST_TB A , HOME_POST_TB B , USER_TB C WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.POST_ID = A.POST_ID AND B.GUBUN = 'T' AND C.USER_ID = A.UPDATE_ID

SELECT 'POST' AS GUBUN , A.POST_ID , A.PLACE_ID , A.TITLE , A.SUB_TITLE , A.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , (SELECT COMPANION_TYPE_CD FROM PLACE01_TB WHERE PLACE_ID = A.PLACE_ID) AS COMPANION_TYPE , C.USER_NM AS WRITER , A.UPDATE_DT AS WRITE_DATE FROM POST_TB A , HOME_POST_TB B , USER_TB C WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.POST_ID = A.POST_ID AND B.GUBUN = 'B' AND C.USER_ID = A.UPDATE_ID

SELECT 'POST' AS GUBUN , B.POST_ID , B.PLACE_ID , B.TITLE , B.SUB_TITLE , B.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , (SELECT COMPANION_TYPE_CD FROM PLACE01_TB WHERE PLACE_ID = B.PLACE_ID) AS COMPANION_TYPE , C.USER_NM AS WRITER , B.UPDATE_DT AS WRITE_DATE FROM CATEGORY_POST_TB A , POST_TB B , USER_TB C WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CATEGORY_CD = #{cd} AND B.POST_ID = A.POST_ID AND C.USER_ID = B.UPDATE_ID

SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT 'POST' AS GUBUN , A.POST_ID , A.PLACE_ID , A.TITLE , A.SUB_TITLE , A.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , (SELECT COMPANION_TYPE_CD FROM PLACE01_TB WHERE PLACE_ID = A.PLACE_ID) AS COMPANION_TYPE , C.USER_NM AS WRITER , A.UPDATE_DT AS WRITE_DATE FROM POST_TB A , PLACE02_TB B , USER_TB C WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.SEQ_NO = 1 AND B.PLACE_ID = A.PLACE_ID AND C.USER_ID = A.UPDATE_ID AND B.LARGE_CATEGORY_CD = #{cd} UNION ALL SELECT 'PLACE' AS GUBUN , '' AS POST_ID , A.PLACE_ID , '[관광지]' || A.PLACE_NM AS TITLE , A.PLACE_OUTLINE AS SUB_TITLE , A.RPSNT_IMAGE_URL , A.COMPANION_TYPE_CD , C.USER_NM AS WRITER , A.UPDATE_DT AS WRITE_DATE FROM PLACE01_TB A , PLACE02_TB B , USER_TB C WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.SEQ_NO = 1 AND B.PLACE_ID = A.PLACE_ID AND C.USER_ID = A.CREATE_ID AND B.LARGE_CATEGORY_CD = #{cd} ) X
